00047 BooleanDomain::BooleanDomain(rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node)
00048   :BasicInterval(node), m_full(true) {
00049   rapidxml::xml_attribute<> *value = node.first_attribute("value");
00050   if( NULL!=value ) {
00051     m_val = TREX::utils::string_cast<bool>(std::string(value->value(), 
00052                                                  value->value_size()));
00053     m_full = false;
00054   } else 
00055     completeParsing(node); // just in case someone used min/max
00056 }
00057 
00058 std::ostream &BooleanDomain::toXml(std::ostream &out, 
00059                                size_t tabs) const {
00060     std::fill_n(std::ostream_iterator<char>(out), tabs, ' ');
00061     out<<"<bool";
00062     if( !m_full )
00063         out<<" value=\""<<m_val<<'\"';
00064     out<<"/>";
00065     return out;
00066 }

00069 bool BooleanDomain::intersect(DomainBase const &other) const {
00070   if( other.getTypeName()!=getTypeName() )
00071     return false;
00072   else {
00073     BooleanDomain const &ref = dynamic_cast<BooleanDomain const &>(other);
00074     
00075     return m_full || ref.m_full || m_val==ref.m_val;
00076   }
00077 }
00078 
00079 bool BooleanDomain::equals(DomainBase const &other) const {
00080   if( other.getTypeName()!=getTypeName() )
00081     return false;
00082   else {
00083     BooleanDomain const &ref = dynamic_cast<BooleanDomain const &>(other);
00084     if( m_full )
00085       return ref.m_full;
00086     else 
00087       return !ref.m_full && m_val==ref.m_val;
00088   } 
00089 }
00090       
00091 DomainBase &BooleanDomain::restrictWith(DomainBase const &other) {
00092   if( other.getTypeName()!=getTypeName() )
00093     throw EmptyDomain(*this, "Incompatible types");
00094   else {
00095     BooleanDomain const &ref = dynamic_cast<BooleanDomain const &>(other);
00096     if( m_full ) {
00097       m_full = ref.m_full;
00098       m_val = ref.m_val;
00099     } else if( !ref.m_full && m_val!=ref.m_val ) 
00100       throw EmptyDomain(*this, "intersection is empty.");
00101   }
00102   return *this;
00103 }
